name: Hentai Series: Classic
description:
Hentai Series is the game where you have to complete 8 puzzles by moving blocks and collect images of girls after completing level.

It's a great moment when your imagination becomes reality and no one can stop you...

A - Auto complete level.

F - Game self-destruction mode (close the game in one moment).|

Arrows - Navigate through gallery and levels.

Meet unknown women, will you know their name's... stories?
All you can see now is their appearence. Should you play a detective game to understand who they are?
